statements: SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT user_name, user_age, home_location FROM user_profiles WHERE prefered_language = 'English';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY user_age DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM user_profiles WHERE home_location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_age > 30 ORDER BY user_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE prefered_language = 'English' AND user_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM user_profiles WHERE prefered_language = 'French' OR prefered_language = 'Spanish';
SELECT user_name, user_email, home_location FROM user_profiles WHERE user_age < 25 AND prefered_language IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT prefered_language FROM user_profiles WHERE home_location LIKE '%city%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT user_id, theme_preference, voice_preference FROM user_preferences WHERE language_preference = 'English';
SELECT email FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number = '1234567890';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT user_preferences.user_id, language_preference, theme_preference FROM user_preferences JOIN user_profiles ON user_preferences.user_id = user_profiles.user_id WHERE theme_preference = 'dark';
SELECT user_profiles.user_id, first_name, last_name, timezone FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM voice_assistant_settings WHERE voice_type = 'male' ORDER BY setting_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, language, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English' AND theme = 'Dark';
SELECT user_id, wake_word, volume FROM voice_assistant_settings WHERE volume >= 50 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(preference_id) AS num_preferences FROM user_preferences GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_preferences > 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme_color, notification_setting FROM user_preferences WHERE notification_setting = true;
SELECT user_id, command, execution_timestamp FROM voice_command_logs WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM voice_command_logs ORDER BY execution_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_devices WHERE user_id = 4 AND device_type = 'Smart Bulb';
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM UserDevices ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT assistant_language, home_theme, notification_settings FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT command_id, voice_command, date_created FROM UserVoiceCommands WHERE user_id = 3;
